text: Henry Tennant (1823-1910) was a British railway administrator. He served as general manager of the North Eastern Railway from 1870 to 1891. He was chairman of the Central London Railway from 1895 to 1898 and a director of the company after that. ==Locomotive Committee== From 1884 to 1885 the North Eastern Railway was without a Locomotive Superintendent. During this period the work was done by a Locomotive Committee, chaired by Henry Tennant.http://www.lner.info/eng/tennant.shtml The committee designed the NER 1463 Class 2-4-0 steam locomotive. ==References== Category:1823 births Category:1910 deaths Category:British businesspeople Category:People educated at Ackworth School Category:People associated with transport in London Category:North Eastern Railway (UK) people
title: Henry Tennant (railway administrator)
